mapper.insert: insert into householder( mid , password , name , carnumber , residentNumber, dong , ho , phonenumber ) values(#{mid}, #{password},#{name},#{carnumber},#{residentNumber},#{dong} , #{ho} , #{phonenumber} )
mapper.update: update householder set password = #{password}, name = #{name}, set carnumber = #{carnumber}, residentNumber = #{residentNumber}, set dong = #{dong}, set ho = #{ho}, set phonenumber = #{phonenumber} where mid = #{mid}
